application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3a (Sample panel of proposed new brickwork, including colour, texture, facebond, mortar and pointing, in relation to the new lower ground rear extension) of Listed Building consent LB/23/03304 (Replacement of non-original rear extension; construction of basement below replacement extension; internal alterations including reinstatement of original features and removal of non-original partitions; replacement of non original secondary glazing on front facade; replacement single glazing with double within existing sash windows on  rear facade; improvement in building's energy performance including roof PV solar panels; replacement of garden structure with an ancillary building; revised landscaping design)
